kalakata ihatha motar ratha prawahana komasaristhuma prakasha karana ladde payakata merata thriroda ratha 72k liyapadinchi karana bawaya. 2011 di thriroda ratha 1,38,426k liyapadinchi karana lada athara 2012 di liyapadinchi thriroda sankhyawa 7,10,919 dakwa ihalagos thibuni. 2017 maha banku warthawa wartha kota athi paridi merata athi liyapadinchi thriroda ratha sankhyawa salakana wita wayasa awurudu 35ta adu kotharam riyaduran pirisak thrirodayen ‘bada rassawa’ karanawadayi asthamenthu gatha nokirima balawath aduwaki.
